price: Yalanlayan o nimet sahipleri ile beni başbaşa bırak ve onlara azıcık mühlet ver.
arabic: وَذَرۡنِي وَٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ أُوْلِي ٱلنَّعۡمَةِ وَمَهِّلۡهُمۡ قَلِيلًا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wadharnī wal-mukadhibīna ulī al-naʿmati wamahhil'hum qalīlan
